column5: I saw this link on another site and thought some may be interested. I've seen a few of the t-shirts with these prints but still thought some would be interested.  I hope this is not considered spam. I have no affiliation with the company.    Rapala wallpaper
Thanks for ther link, they look great on my screen

Nice indeed but you would however think that having Rapala as a sponsor, Bernie Schultz and Larry Nixon would at least be able to catch their own fish. Perhaps that same fish travels from lake to lake.
